critique: The document discusses amending Schedule A, Subdivision VIII, of positions excepted from examination under Civil-Service Rule II, section 3, by revoking paragraphs 1 and 20. This change includes positions like the superintendent of the Hot Springs Reservation and superintendents/officers in charge of national parks or reservations in the competitive classified service. This action appears to promote a more standardized and merit-based system for these roles. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power dynamics, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation changes, or social inclusion aspects. The document seems primarily focused on civil service procedures and doesn't directly address any of the specified axes in a significant way.
